reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Sechelt Indian Government District Enabling Act
reg:regulation.reg:title:
Sechelt Indian Government District
Municipal Benefits Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The Sechelt Indian Government District is entitled to or eligible for the following municipal benefits:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: grants under the Local Government Grants Act;

subject to an agreement being entered into under section 2 of the Provincial-Municipal Partnership Act1, incentives for economic development and participation in economic development programs of the government under that Act.

bcl:footnote.bcl:text: Section 7 of the Provincial-Municipal Partnership Act was consolidated as section 319 (1) of the Municipal Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 323. Sections 1 to 6 of the Provincial-Municipal Partnership Act were not consolidated and the Act was subsequently repealed by 1997-25-219 (c), effective July 28/97.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Sechelt Indian Government District Enabling Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 416, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 4]
